page.title: 18A DAY AT PENPONT SCHOOL
page.content: I live at Glendow up the Tynron glen.I rise for school at 7.45,have breakfast and catch the school bus at 9.10.Work starts at 9.20.I begin with silent reading of my novel followed by maths, S.R.A. and research-laboratory. Music,P.E. and environmental studies fill in the rest of the day. I like drama and creative writing best. Lunch is cooked on the premises but I enjoy packed lunches.School finishes at 3.30.When I get home I feed my pets then I usually ride my horse,Elfin. After tea I help my mum.Then I excerc- ise my favorite horse Pandora.I watch T.V.for nearly half an hour each day.I read before sleeping.Lights go out at 9.00.Every day is a busy day for me. It's an action-packed life living in the country.
